name: Bob's Habanero Hot Sauce
author: Bob Miller
ingredients: 400g can sliced peaches in heavy syrup
instructions: Place the peppers, peaches, molasses, mustard, brown sugar, and vinegar into the container of a food processor or blender.
Measure in the salt, paprika, pepper, cumin, coriander, ginger and allspice.
Blend until liquefied. Pour into clean jars, and refrigerate overnight before using.
